capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's just so iconic in the wizarding world, you know? As a pure-blood witch herself, it's amazing to see her break away from that traditional lineage and forge her own path. I completely agree with her stance on being proud of one's heritage, but also recognizing the importance of individuality and self-discovery.
